description.en:
Thirteen-year-old Himeno Otome dreams to launch, through her family modeling agency, many girls, like the fairy godmother did with Cinderella. Asking for more would be ridiculous: with small face and small eyes, and an above the average height of 170 cm, it is better for Otome to leave the role of Cinderella to Hanamura Karen, the only source of income for the Himeno agency. However, when Karen moves to a larger company, Otome and her father find themselves in trouble and their agency is taken over by Nanao Amamiya, a young prodigy painter, who transforms Otome into a model.

Source: MU

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **170 cm Otometica** (2018)
description.id:
Otome seorang gadis berwajah biasa yang memiliki tinggi badan 170 cm, bertemu dengan Nanao, seorang seniman berbakat . Dengan tangannya, gadis seperti apa pun bisa dibuatnya jadi cantik, dan hal itu mengubah Otome menjadi seorang model!

(Source: [Elex Media](https://elexmedia.id/produk/detail/elexmedia2018-170-cm-otometica-01/9786020486611))
